messages.title: THE TORIES HAVE WRECKED THE NORTH EAST BEFORE...
messages.content: ...AND THEY'LL DO IT AGAIN! YOU CANNOT TRUST THE TORIES

messages.title: THE TORIES ALWAYS TRASH THE NORTH EAST
messages.content: People are poorer, Hospital services closing, Waiting lists are longer, Crime going up, Teachers losing their jobs, Pensions are at risk

messages.title: USE YOUR VOTE FOR LABOUR
messages.content: TO STAND UP FOR THE NORTH EAST

images.caption: FOR THE MANY NOT THE FEW #VoteLabour
